metadata.name: Geometric Pepe Balloon
metadata.description:
Pepe save the world! For the culture!

This is FANART Nyan Balloon Created 2023 by NIMA 

This is burn token. You'll have the option to exchange your Pepe Balloon for a new piece in next 48 hours. Then in next 2-3 days new Pepe Balloon will appear. After 24 hours the Pepe is sealed, and a new character will take its place in next 2-3 days. Please check @_nimahoseini Twitter page above for more details.
